titleStmt.title: Christs confession and complaint concering his kingdom and seruants; conuincing Iewes of obstinacie, Romish Catholickes of conspiracie, seducers of sedition, Arminians of apostacie, and diuers others of coldnes, schisme, treachery & hypocrisie. By J.P.
titleStmt.author: I. P., fl. 1629.

notesStmt.note: Errata on recto of M4, final leaf.
Some print faded and show-through; upper margins cropped; title page stained.
Reproduction of original in the Sion College. Library.
